text:
Need Sarah Chen for Lush camp. Budget around $26,635, looking for 2 x Pinterest pin, 3 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Social media takeover, 3 x Radio interview, 2 x Facebook post. 7 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 2 months. reckon

Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
